name: Igloo Trampoline (A Game A Week - 3)
description:
Instructions

Igloo Trampoline is a game in which you build ice structures out of ice blocks using nothing but your trusty trampoline. Move left and right to intercept the falling ice blocks, and bounce them towards the crosshairs in the construction zone.

Controls

Use W/D or left/right arrow keys to move left/right.

Intercept the falling ice to bounce it towards your mouse. It will travel in a parabolic arc, reaching its height at your mouse position at the time of the bounce. (Please appreciate this, I did so much math to get this to work just right)
